languages.text: "Излить длинную оправдательную речь? Это лишнее. Всю информацию, которая мне от вас нужна, я получу во время допроса — без свидетелей, будь то ваша охрана или Вольный Торговец. Только вы, я и Глейто". {n}Кибермастиф издает низкий рык, от которого по коже бегут мурашки.{/n}

"Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Излить длинную оправдательную речь? Это лишнее. Всю информацию, которая мне от вас нужна, я получу во время допроса — без свидетелей, будь то ваша охрана или Вольный Торговец. Только вы, я и Глейто". {n}Кибермастиф издает низкий рык, от которого по коже бегут мурашки.{/n}

Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

"Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

languages.text: "Eine langgezogene entlastende Erklärung abgeben? Das ist nicht nötig. Alle von Euch erforderlichen Informationen werden im Zuge der Befragung eingeholt ... ohne Zeugen, sei es Eure Leibwache oder {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Nur Ihr, ich und Glaito." {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff stößt ein tiefes Knurren aus, das dich schaudern lässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eine langgezogene entlastende Erklärung abgeben? Das ist nicht nötig. Alle von Euch erforderlichen Informationen werden im Zuge der Befragung eingeholt ... ohne Zeugen, sei es Eure Leibwache oder {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Nur Ihr, ich und Glaito." {n}Der Cyber-Mastiff stößt ein tiefes Knurren aus, das dich schaudern lässt.{/n}

languages.text: « Tenter de vous dédouaner par une déclaration interminable ? C'est inutile. Toutes les informations que nous attendons de vous seront obtenues lors de l'interrogatoire... qui se tiendra sans témoin, qu'il s'agisse de votre garde personnelle ou {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Juste vous, moi et Glaito. » {n}Le cyber-mastiff laisse échapper un puissant grognement qui vous fait frissonner.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tenter de vous dédouaner par une déclaration interminable ? C'est inutile. Toutes les informations que nous attendons de vous seront obtenues lors de l'interrogatoire... qui se tiendra sans témoin, qu'il s'agisse de votre garde personnelle ou {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Juste vous, moi et Glaito. » {n}Le cyber-mastiff laisse échapper un puissant grognement qui vous fait frissonner.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Y aguantar un discursito sobre su inocencia? No hay necesidad. La única información que necesito de usted la obtendré durante un interrogatorio... sin testigos, ya sean su guardia personal o {mf|el propio|la propia} Comerciante Independiente. Solamente usted, Glaito y yo». {n}El cibermastín deja escapar un profundo gruñido que te produce un escalofrío.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Y aguantar un discursito sobre su inocencia? No hay necesidad. La única información que necesito de usted la obtendré durante un interrogatorio... sin testigos, ya sean su guardia personal o {mf|el propio|la propia} Comerciante Independiente. Solamente usted, Glaito y yo». {n}El cibermastín deja escapar un profundo gruñido que te produce un escalofrío.{/n}

languages.text: “先准备一份冗长的免责声明吗？没必要。因为所有需要你提供的信息，我们都可以通过审讯获得。这场审讯不会有旁人在场，无论是你的私人保镖，还是行商浪人，都无权参加。届时，只会有你、我、格雷托。”{n}生化獒犬发出了粗重的咆哮声，让你寒毛直竖。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “先准备一份冗长的免责声明吗？没必要。因为所有需要你提供的信息，我们都可以通过审讯获得。这场审讯不会有旁人在场，无论是你的私人保镖，还是行商浪人，都无权参加。届时，只会有你、我、格雷托。”{n}生化獒犬发出了粗重的咆哮声，让你寒毛直竖。{/n}

languages.text: 「長々と自己弁護をするつもりですか？必要ありません。あなたに必要なすべての情報は、尋問の際に得られるでしょう。あなたの護衛やローグトレーダーといった証人がいなくても。あなたと私、それとグライトさえいればね」{n}サイバーマスチフが重い唸り声を上げた。その声が背筋に冷たい震えを走らせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「長々と自己弁護をするつもりですか？必要ありません。あなたに必要なすべての情報は、尋問の際に得られるでしょう。あなたの護衛やローグトレーダーといった証人がいなくても。あなたと私、それとグライトさえいればね」{n}サイバーマスチフが重い唸り声を上げた。その声が背筋に冷たい震えを走らせる。{/n}

languages.text: "Kendinizi aklayan uzun bir ifadede mi bulunacaksınız? Hiç lüzumu yok. Sizden talep edilen tüm bilgiler, tanıksız sorgulama sırasında alınacaktır. Tanığınızın şahsi muhafızınız veya Hür Tacir'in kendisi olması da bunu değiştiremez. Orada sadece siz, ben ve Glaito olacak." {n}Siber mastif öyle bir hırlıyor ki tüylerin diken diken oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Give a protracted self-exonerating statement? There's no need. All information required of you will be obtained during questioning — without witnesses, be it your personal guard or the Rogue Trader. Just you, me, and Glaito." {n}The cyber-mastiff lets out a heavy growl that sends a shiver down your spine.{/n}

Tanığınızın şahsi muhafızınız veya Hür Tacir'in kendisi olması da bunu değiştiremez. Orada sadece siz, ben ve Glaito olacak." {n}Siber mastif öyle bir hırlıyor ki tüylerin diken diken oluyor.{/n}
